text.text_translated: One night in 2003, Suzanne Collins watched TV. She looked at different shows. At that time, there was a war in Iraq. She saw two types of shows on TV. One show was about young people. They tried to win a lot of money. The other shows were news about the war. The two ideas came together in her head. It was a strange idea. This gave her the idea for The Hunger Games.
